QuestData.Title: Test Flight: The Singing Ridge
QuestData.Description: I've been fiddling with the Zephyrium Capicitorium and I'm ready to perform another test! Do you want to help?$B$BThis next flight should be short, but fast!$B$BUm... and although I'm sure there's no danger... I have this, uh, waiver that I'd like you to sign. It's just a formality, I assure you!$B$BBest of luck! Talk to Rally to launch yourself, and come back to me after the experiment is over!
QuestData.LogDescription: Sign Tally's Waiver, then speak with Rally Zapnabber to use the Zephyrium Capacitorium.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Tally Zapnabber at Toshley's Station in the Blade's Edge Mountains.
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't worry, $n! Worry never got anyone anywhere!
QuestData.RewardText: Wow! Again, you survived! I'm a much better engineer than I give myself credit for!$B$BHere's your pay! And check back with me later... I'll have more experiments that'll need more test subjects!
